title: ALL DEVS READ FIRST BEFORE BIDDING  -- Cross platform mobile application development.
desc: ALL DEVS READ FIRST BEFORE BIDDINGCross platform mobile application development.Application Category: Dating & Life stylePlatform: IOS,Android,WindowsDeployment: Amazon AWSTeam Minimum Requirement:Software ArchitectUI DesignerRelease OptimiserAwarded Candidate must sign IPS,IPA and copyrights disclosure.Ongoing application development project for mobile dating app (native app for each platform) the application will require close GPS circuit to 4 meters accuracy and more than 10 meters distance from app user.Similar to Tinder but on closer circuit.Initial Features:•	View available users within 10 meters distance from user.•	Like & Match•	Messaging•	Messages only available to matched users•	Notify liked user by their potential match•	Push notifications•	User registrationo	Email & Mobile Number Registration (classic method)o	Social Login (Facebook, Gmail, Twitter)Design feature:We will be providing a story mock-up to what we wish to see. All UI designs must meet responsiveness standardsOptimisation:Application must be Memory optimised, processor optimised and loop free.GPS API is based on each platform standard MAPS ex: Android will use google maps and IOS will use Apple Maps.Bidding criteria:•	Bids without full proposal will not be considered•	All applicants must provide portfolio and evidence of previous projects•	All transactions will only be through freelancer using milestones•	Commitment and dedication

title: OTT Project
desc: I am looking for a freelancer or a company who has experience and have done projects in IPTV/OTT.I want someone who has the script and code so we dont have to start and work from a scratch. I would like to see a demo.1. Option to add different streams/channels.2. Video on Demand3. Movie on Demand4. Fantastic User interface5. Device authentication - IP, MAC, login6. Multi device playing7. Should be compatible with Android & iOS (Apk/sdk and iOS app to be provided)8. Easy to use and fully comprehensive Backend/Admin panel9. Option to run pre, mid and post ads in different streams and have a complete data of different ads ran, timing with viewers online10. Should have agent/reseller login and option for agent/reseller to activate their devices and complete white label billing solution11. Should be able to offer the solution as white labelled where reseller/agent can have their own little admin dashboard and their apps in their name/logos but controlled by Super admin12. Should be able to add/remove channels to reseller/agents13. Option to download videos for 7 days in app which should automatically delete after 7 days14. Option to buy to view content. Gateway integration option from super admin. Should be in sandbox types.15. Should pick up geo location of the device and show relevant content first and also create heat map in super admin.16. Super admin should be able to ping message to single or all viewers in text format or run a video as and when required.17. Should compare of all channels/streams watched on the basis of what content, devices, location, etc.18. Option for advertisements as well on user screen/home screen.19. Should have complete EPGOnly freelancers who has worked on similar projects will be considered. Don't bid just for sake without reading all details. Freelancers with understanding of content will be given priority. Freelancers with understanding of CDN or create a virtual CND will be given preference.Payment via Freelancer only on 100% delivery of the project, NO EXCUSES. OTT & IPTV & STB Middleware solutions with billing.Also you should be able to install middleware on a VPS Server. Must be step by step from installation to server to authentication, channels configuration etc, I mean the whole process, kind of ready to play plug and play. At the end the STB should be working with channels with authentication from STB to access channels package and I need full documentation on it as well.Option to use wowza ,primecast streaming services or any other better services should be advised.Security is Vital so complete demonstration of the same should be made.Should be able to use RTMP ,HTTP, RTSP, HLS streams for the video, radio link and VOD movies MP4.The goal is to setup on OTT subscription on MiniPC Android and Linux set top box

title: Create an app for my Sneaker resell marketplace.
desc: 1. Should have a sign up for sellers and for buyers2. Sellers need to be verified to sign up, buyers dont.3. Once a seller has been verified and signed up, they can proceed to input a list of all their inventory.4. Once a buyer has logged in they select a city.5. Within the city page, a buyer can view all the different models of shoes and clothing available in the city.6. This means that the website should categorise sellers by city and consolidate all inventory and prices based on city pages.7. The price is set by the seller but when a buyer navigates to the shoe page, only the lowest price in each size is shown.8. If the buyer has decided to buy a shoe, they will be asked to deposit a sum of money into a bank account.9.  Once this is done, the app has to ask for submission of a receipt from the bank via image upload.10. Then, the buyer is able to schedule a Cash on Delivery transaction via a Date/Time scheduling mechanism.11. Once the scheduling is complete, the seller needs to be notified that a runner will be picking up the shoe.12. The seller needs to input certain times of the day that he is/is not available for pickup upon registering for the app (i.e. classes etc.)13. The seller then delivers the shoe to the runner who delivers it to the buyer.

title: I need an Ios app to be fixed
desc: I have an App that's being developped now and my team has done lots of work on it using Swift mostly and Objective C.The app is like a Social Media that has chatting function like WhatsApp and image/video sharing/posting feeds similar to twitter.These are the problems we are having that I need an expert to help me fix:CHAT SECTION1. 3 ROUNDED CORNERS SPEECH BALLOON:-I want the chat speech balloon to have 3 rounded corners. We couldn't get this, so we rounded all 4 corners. SO, I want to make it 3 rounded corners and make the bottom-right corner sharp.2. KEYPAD - EMOJI TOGGLE:-We have an emoji icon to display emojis, but to toggle back to the keyboard, we made another "ABC" icon.However, what I want is to remove the "ABC" icon. So, to toggle back to the keypad (while on emoji display), just tap on the text field.3. IMAGE SENDING VIA CHAT:What we have now is When you send image via chat, the images are distorted. Stretched or squashed.What I want is to fix the image distortion and allow for the ability to select multiple images and edit the images before sending; like; pencil on it, crop and send full resolution image.4. MESSAGE HISTORY DISPLAY:What I have now is, when you open a friend's chat page, Your old message history does not display your latest message. You have to slide/scroll up a few messages up to be able to see the last message sent.What I want is that, Once you open the message page it should display the latest chat history.5. CHAT HISTORY FUNCTIONS:I want to add the function that, when you press the chat speech/text balloon, you should see options to; DELETE, COPY, FORWARD and probably, recall the message. We don;t have this functions yet.======FEEDS SECTION (Like TWITTER)1. We have a Custom image layout display - But again, the images are distorted (Stretched and squashed). We want this fixed.2. The app crashes when you try to access phone's album or take a pic to post. So we want this fixed and add the functions to take instant pic or take short video and post.We have all the UI done and set. And the App is already on Apple Store for testing only.Also I have the UI design for all the changes I want you to make. And We want the corrections done on iOS

desc: I am in need of a midi-player for embedding in a web page, with the following characteristics:On "admin" level: Upload midi-files to a library. Set library content levelsOn "user" level:The player itself, with the following playback options:-Speed-Volume-PitchInclude/exclude instruments (e.g. piano, bass, drums)The player should work in both desktop web as well as mobile apps (IOS, Android)Here you can see a simple illustration i made [url removed, login to view]The application is  for use in commercial siteThis is my first posting, so i'm not sure if this is sufficient information for you to send a quota. I would prefer a fixed price offer, but I'm open to discussions about form of payment.
